relevant_findings.treatment_start: Prednisolone and fludrocortisone started at age 10 yr 4 months

changes_over_time.adrenal_function: Developed signs of adrenal insufficiency at age 9 yr, treated at age 10 yr 4 months
changes_over_time.puberty_progression: Puberty staging improved from Tanner G1P1 with 2 ml testes at age 10.7 yr to G1P1 with 6 ml testes and penile length 5 cm at age 14.2 yr
changes_over_time.height_growth: Increased from 125 cm at age 10.7 yr to 144.5 cm at age 14.2 yr
changes_over_time.weight_change: Increased from 25 kg at age 10.7 yr to 46 kg at age 14.2 yr
